name: Confirm Light Pole Locations are as per latest Drawing revision and does not clash with other Services.
Comments: Design Engineer to approve if the location needs to be moved.
Check Survey Setout and Setbacks are to the dimensions as detailed on drawings.
Confirm Foundation Type i.e. Ground plant, Barrier mount etc.
Pothole existing services within close proximity to the foundation.
Ensure permit to dig is in place.
Check depth and diameter at completion.
Ensure base of shaft is clean and dry.
If fixing onto barrier ensure bolts drilled to correct depth.
Check the location, orientation, level and verticality of foundation prior to pouring/backfilling.
Ensure 1 x 65mm dia flexi duct is installed and taped off at each end.
Design Engineer inspected the foundation prior to pouring
Order concrete for shear base, ensure correct mix delivered, correct slump, concrete vibrated, dockets collected
Attach delivery dockets and write the road light column numbers on the docket
Suitable backfill material to be placed and tampered for compaction
Concrete/backfill placed to just below the shear base and concrete splashes onto column washed off.
At the completion of the concreting/backfilling check the foundation location, level, verticality and height from FRL.
Comments: Foundation may have moved during concreting/backfilling
Ensure concrete foundation has been left for min. 3 days before erecting road light column
Check road light column for any damage
Comments: Do not install if damaged
Assemble Light column on the ground (protect column by blocking off the ground)
Check all bolts on shear bases have been torqued
Comments: Adjust column to ensure vertical
Check orientation of road light column and outreach
Comments: Torque to 200kPa, check the bolt and slack back to 100kPa
Check the internal wiring of the road lighting column. Ensure 2.5mm2 cables, 2 core NS
Check Connectors & Earth Conductors have been installed
Danger Live Wires sticker on gear door
Check that the Road light is installed to the design height above road level
The above works have been inspected and are considered compliant with the drawings, specifications and instructions
